text: Psychosaura is a genus of skinks. Both species are endemic to Brazil. ==Species== The following 2 species, listed alphabetically by specific name, are recognized as being valid: *Psychosaura agmosticha (Rodrigues, 2000) *Psychosaura macrorhyncha (Hoge, 1946) – Hoge's mabuya Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Psychosaura. ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Taxa named by Stephen Blair Hedges Category:Taxa named by Caitlin E. Conn
title: Psychosaura
